mapper.select: SELECT emp_id AS id, emp_name AS name, emp_no AS socialNumber, emp_address AS address, emp_email AS email, emp_joined AS joinedDate, annual_leave AS annualLeave, emp_pwd AS password, profile, emp_phone AS phone, dept_code AS deptCode, position_value AS positionValue, view_auth AS viewAuth FROM employee WHERE emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
